SENT.plain: The authors describe pathological changes, incl
X-ray changes and histological documentation, in two patients with the syndrome of naevoid basiliomas
In the treatment cryosurgery proved useful
In the discussion the authors summarize literary data on the frequency of basiliomas in different organs and systems of ectodermal and mesodermal origin and on the incidence of malignant tumours
They emphasize interdisciplinary cooperation, early establishment of the diagnosis and dispensarization of the patients
